briefdescription.para: Implements general functionality classes that are used project wide.

detaileddescription.para: Implements general functionality classes that are used project wide.

listitem.para: Source/Utils provides string conversion and console output utilities.
Source/Utils/CommandLine implements a command line argument parser.
Source/Utils/UserInterface provides a terminal drawing context.

sect1.title: Defined In
sect1.para: The source is defined in Source/Utils
